title: Original Xenu story - with the voice of Ron the ConMan
description:
This is the Xenu Story from a tape from the so called "class VIII auditor course". Hear the bastard Lafayette Ron Hubbard in his own words telling the Xenu Story which is often denied by Scientologist, either 'cause they haven't payed enough to the greedy criminal con cult or 'cause they were ordered to lie. The full tape can be found on wikileaks.org. 

Lot's of blabla and other nonsense in there, as usual when dickhead Ron opens his mouth. Sorry could get it shorter without destroying credibility (didn't wanted to split it so that no one could say it's out of context). 


Help to destroy Scientology! It's just a big fat global dangerous fascistic scam. Nothing else.
